What is required to create a currency of a specific name on Verus?
To create a currency of a specific name on Verus, you need an ID of the same name. The controller of this ID is the only one who can create a currency of that name, and they can only do so once.

What is the relationship between an ID and a currency on Verus?

On Verus, an ID of a specific name is required to create a currency of the same name. The controller of the ID has the sole authority to create a currency of that name, and this can only be done once.
